archived.description: Flag indicating if the project is archived

dateArchived.description: Date when the project was archived

dateCreated.description: Date when the project was created

clientName.description: Name of the client associated with the project

clientId.description: ID of the client associated with the project

budgetAlertPercent.description: Percentage at which a budget alert will be triggered

laborCost.description: Total labor cost incurred for the project

totalTimeLogged.description: Total time logged for the project

totalAmount.description: Total amount invoiced for the project

totalExpense.description: Total expenses incurred for the project

totalCost.description: Total cost of the project including labor and expenses

billableTimeLogged.description: Total time logged that is billable

totalBillableAmount.description: Total amount billed for billable time

billable.description: Flag indicating if the project is billable

budgetPeriodType.description: Type of budget period (e.g., monthly, quarterly)
